short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hakka Shopify chrome extension lets you quickly create orders from anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the Hakka Chrome Extension, you can create shopify orders from anywhere. No more bookmarking tabs and struggling to switch back and forth -- our extension lets you create orders with ease.
